forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers likely. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the evening, then mostly cloudy with light rain possible overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Windy with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then clearing later on. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 58F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
